snippet: A national creed called besa obligates Albanians to provide shelter and safe passage for anyone seeking protection.
abstract: Story of how Albania saved virtually all of its 200 native Jews and 400 Jewish refugees from Germany and Austria, in addition to helping spirit hundreds more over from Nazi-occupied lands, will be retold in Dec at the Museum of Jewish Heritage in New York; Albania has practical reasons for wanting this story known, as it is seeking membership in the European Union.
lead_paragraph: A national creed called besa obligates Albanians to provide shelter and safe passage for anyone seeking protection.
